item.title: React 18 + TypeScript: A Powerful Combination for Frontend Applications
item.description: 1. Introduction to React React, developed by Facebook, is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It utilizes a virtual DOM to enhance performance and provides a declarative programming approach for UI construction. React has become one of the most popular tools for building modern web applications. 1.1 Advantages of React High Performance: React boosts performance by using a virtual DOM and provides performance optimization techniques. A prime example is the useMemo hook in React Hooks, which can be used for memoizing computations, preventing unnecessary recalculations.
